Title: Relates to allowing for a dismissal of a claim based on claimant's failure to comply with pleading requirements
Summary: Allows for amendments to timely filed notices of intention to correct a mistake, omission, irregularity or defect made in good faith.
LawCode: Amd ยง11, Ct Claims Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the court of claims act, in relation to allowing for dismissal of a claim based on claimant's failure to comply with pleading requirements
